short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pixel Gun Apocalypse is an online multiplayer game. Track down weapons and supplies while you fight to stay alive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,f:
Test out your fighting skills in the original and amazing Pixel Gun Apocalypse! This thrilling first person shooter is set in a blocky world that is not too dissimilar from Minecraft. Take part in a variety of different game modes including team deathmatch and zombie survival - each different game mode will test your skill and fighting prowess.

During each game, you can control a number of cool weapons including a pistol, machine gun and even a rocket launcher. If you choose to be a zombie, you can only use your hands so movement and stealth are key to success! The variety of different maps, fun gameplay, and interesting game modes make this blocky shooter an instant success. 

Character controls

WASD or arrow keys to move
Left click to shoot
1 to 9 key to change weapon
R to reload
Ctrl to prone
C to crouch
Shift to sprint
long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fil,lt,lv,pt:
Pixel Gun Apocalypse is an online multiplayer game. Track down weapons and supplies while you fight to stay alive. 


How To Play Duck Life 3 Game Online:-

1. Firstly Click on "Add To Chrome" Button.
2. After Install just click on "Extension Icon" Button.
3. After click you redirect Game Page, where you play Duck Life 3 Game Online.
